  • Classes in eu.europa.esig.dss.tsl used by eu.europa.esig.dss.tsl 
    Class and Description
    Condition
    Represents a condition defined in the trusted list on a certificate.
    KeyUsageBit
    KeyUsage bit values KeyUsage ::= BIT STRING { digitalSignature (0), nonRepudiation (1), keyEncipherment (2), dataEncipherment (3), keyAgreement (4), keyCertSign (5), cRLSign (6), encipherOnly (7), decipherOnly (8) }
    MatchingCriteriaIndicator
    How the conditions are aggregated.
    ServiceInfo
    From a validation point of view, a Service is a set of pair ("Qualification Statement", "Condition").
    ServiceInfoStatus 
    TLInfo 
    TSLConditionsForQualifiers
    This class is a DTO representation for qualifier and conditions
    TSLParserResult
    This class is a DTO result for TSLParser Callable
    TSLPointer
    This class is a DTO representation for a TSL pointer
    TSLService
    This class is a DTO representation for a TSL service
    TSLServiceProvider
    This class is a DTO representation for a TSL service provider
    TSLServiceStatusAndInformationExtensions 
    TSLValidationResult
    This class is a DTO result for TSLValidator Callable.
